name: Late Night Transit
description:
This is just a spooky story that I thought of, and I wanted to try my hand at writing interactive fiction. I know  that it doesn't have music and sound FX (sorry about that), but I just wanted to get this out there. Besides, I'm a lot more adept at storytelling.

Anyway, I made this in Twine. Although, if I ever decide to redo this story or just make a new one then I might use a different program, but I'll see.

Anyway, hope you enjoy it :)
